subject: College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Wisconsin Coach Bret Bielema agreed to become the new coach at Arkansas, taking over a program that had begun with hopes of challenging for a national championship but stumbled into an awful season.
snippet: Wisconsin Coach Bret Bielema agreed to become the new coach at Arkansas, taking over a program that had begun with hopes of challenging for a national championship but stumbled into an awful season.
